com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.messaging.dual

Class DualModeMessageReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.messaging.AbstractMessageReceiver
      • com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.messaging.dual.DualModeMessageReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMessageListener, IMessageReceiver

    public class DualModeMessageReceiver
extends AbstractMessageReceiver
implements IMessageReceiver, IMessageListener
    Provides support for receiving data over either a local or remote receiver. The local receiver is for data sent within the same JVM as an instance of this class. The remote receiver is for receiving data from other JVMs on the same or other hosts as the JVM hosting an instance of this receiver.
    Author:
    dawood
